channel.title: [Aggroth] 2k6 remake - Client help needed
channel.description:
Hello mopar, this is a simple topic,
I am working on a HUGE remake of 2k6 scape
or, runescape in 2006
I got alot atm, but i am not a client coder, and i was wondering if anyone could program my client into a cachedownloader, it works now, but i cant make it into a webclient, also, i didnt code anything of it, i will give you the client, and if its done, let me know, and you will gain acces into this project :
[img]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/Knipsel-13.png[/img] [img]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j332/zerofax/Knipse2l.png[/img]
more prints will be given when im back - gtg now Also, i know how to make website's so thats not an issue.
message me if you want to give it a try...
